header.title: Ageism and misogyny could become hate crimes in UK, but police are wary
header.subtitle: NA
header.postText: In a bid to protect British values, the UK Home Secretary has launched a review into hate crime legislation. He wants to expand the law to protect more vulnerable sections of society, but as Polly Boiko reports not everyone is happy with the idea. RT LIVE https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IFAcq...  Check out http://rt.com. Subscribe to RT! http://www.youtube.com/subscription_c... Like us on Facebook http://www.facebook.com/RTnews. Follow us on VK https://vk.com/rt_international. Follow us on Twitter http://twitter.com/RT_com. Follow us on Instagram http://instagram.com/rt. Follow us on Google+ http://plus.google.com/+RT. #RT (Russia Today) is a global #news network broadcasting from Moscow and Washington studios. RT is the first news channel to break the 1 billion YouTube views benchmark.
